name: Archery (itch) (xtaxta)
description:
Archery for Playdate

This is a simple game. Can you hit the target with your bow?



* Use the crank to power up (or unpower) your bow.
* Press Up or Down to adjust your bow
* Press A to shoot your bow

When you hit the target, you don't use up any arrows. If you can keep hitting the target, it will speed up.

Note: You need a Playdate console (or simulator) to launch this app.
